creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text:
As discussed on the mailing list:
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/poi-dev/201011.mbox/%3Calpine.DEB.1.10.1011012018090.11599@urchin.earth.li%3E

I intend to switch how we publish to the website. This will involve firstly tweaking the build, so that generated site ends up in SVN rather than just on your local disk. Then, when the site is in SVN, we'll need to raise a ticket with Infra to have the website switched from the people.apache.org rsync to doing svn checkout + poll

I'll hopefully have a chance to do this in the near future

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: As far as I see this is in place since a long time already now...
